roleset.name: very big
roleset.note: LARGE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. Comparison to 'big-j.01'. (from large.01-j)
LARGER-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from larger.01-j)

example.name: larger-j: lexicalized comparative, with CXN
example.text: So what may appear as a rich mineral bonanza , will be shot down for now and the forseable future , because the cost of extraction , is larger that any profit margin .
